TopicTitle: Get KSP on sale at the Humble Store!

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1mrNSDn"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/1ad6e0d116f6e96fcf2ecd8026b983db/tumblr_inline_nblpemmof51rr2wit.png"/></a></p>

<p><span><em>Kerbal Space Program</em> is now on sale at the <a href="http://bit.ly/1mrNSDn"><strong>HUMBLE STORE</strong></a>! Summer may be cooling off, but our contracts are just heating up. Well, not too much, we hope. We don’t want any explosions happening here, do we?</span><br/><br/><span>As always, a purchase of your <a href="http://bit.ly/1mrNSDn"><strong>HUMBLE STORE</strong></a> purchase will help support some fine charities, so if you or others are looking to travel to space for a good cause, now’s the time!</span></p>

Edit - Fixed.

Edited September 9, 2014 by Aethon

This ^

For a second, I read it "grr" and thought we made SQUAD mad.
Does anyone proofread these posts? (I mean, it seems as if every time a SQUAD post pops up, this happens.)
Well, SQUAD is always super busy, so I doubt they spend a whole lot of time proofreading. Give them a break!
Hey, it's been fixed! Good job, SQUAD.
This appears to be through Steam only if I'm reading it correctly.
